overview: Mykola got a routine life, he wants inner change and spiritual development. His wife Svitlana has her own vision of family life and is not going to change it. Will Mykola have the strength of spirit and courage to stand up for his new habits, keep the respect of his friends, and not succumb to temptations? Mykola will have many surprises along the way, to a new life.
title: Family Is Forever
